referenceObject.reference: Framenau, V. W., Castanheira, P. de S. & Vink, C. J. (2022). Taxonomy and systematics of the new Australo-Pacific orb-weaving spider genus Socca (Araneae: Araneidae). New Zealand Journal of Zoology 49(4): 263-334.
